title: The Fall of FTXâ€™s Sam Bankman-Fried Puts Crypto Industry on Edge
description: The rapid collapse of FTX, built by the billionaire Sam Bankman-Fried, suggests that no company in the freewheeling, loosely regulated crypto industry is safe.
dc:creator: David Yaffe-Bellany
media:credit: Lam Yik Fei for The New York Times
media:description: Sam Bankman-Fried, the head of FTX, was seen as one of the most reliable leaders of the crypto industry.
